Microsoft | Redmond, WA | ONSITE | Software Engineer

The Azure Search team is looking for creative software engineers with background in distributed systems, cloud platforms and/or search technologies to join the core engineering team.

Work with us to build parts of the Azure cloud platform. We're a startup within the company, growing our business with great autonomy and focused on delivering customer value. Read more about how we think about startups, big companies and customer value here: https://medium.com/@pabloc/a-startup-at-microsoft-43dd2a78b9...

If you're interested ping me at pablo.castro (@) microsoft (.) com (no recruiters please)
